ReportSection.name: Consent
ReportSection.title: Consent

ReportItem.no: No, I do not consent to participate

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Study Title: RBC Wellness and RBC Pre Program Survey

The RBC Foundation provided a grant for this program as part of RBC Future Launch.™ We want to understand the impact of this program. One of the best ways to do this is to hear from participants like you.

Your opinion matters to us and can help improve the program for future participants. Please fill out this short survey which should take about 10 minutes to complete. The survey is anonymous and voluntary and your responses will not be used to identify you in any way.

For more information about this study, please view our Letter of Information. For more information about RBC Future Launch, please visit us at http://www.rbc.com/dms/enterprise/futurelaunch/all14-all-or.html.

By clicking below, I am verifying that: I have read the Letter of Information and I consent to participate in this research study:

{$item}

ReportSection.name: Elite Pre-program Survey
ReportSection.ReportItem:
1. I am the following age (Please note: you must be 14 years of age or older to participate)

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Enrolled in school or vocational training (in-school training for a skilled trade or occupation and/or on-the-job workplace training)|Employed full time (30 or more hours per week)|Employed full time (30 or more hours per week) and enrolled in school or vocational training (in-school training for a skilled trade or occupation and/or on-the-job workplace training)|Employed part time (less than 30 hours per week)|Employed part time (less than 30 hours per week) and enrolled in school or vocational training (in-school training for a skilled trade or occupation and/or on-the-job workplace training)|Not enrolled in school, vocational training (in-school training for a skilled trade or occupation and/or on-the-job workplace training) or employment (part time or full time)|Prefer not to answer

ReportSection.ReportItem:
2. Which of the following options best describes you in the past three months?

{$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                    $('span#section1_school').hide();
                    function hideSchool(){
                        if($("input:radio[name='ElitePreprogramSurvey_section1_socio']:checked").val() == "Enrolled in school or vocational training (in-school training for a skilled trade or occupation and/or on-the-job workplace training)"){
                            $('span#section1_school').show();
                        }
                        else if($("input:radio[name='ElitePreprogramSurvey_section1_socio']:checked").val() == "Employed full time (30 or more hours per week) and enrolled in school or vocational training (in-school training for a skilled trade or occupation and/or on-the-job workplace training)"){
                            $('span#section1_school').show();
                        }
                        else if($("input:radio[name='ElitePreprogramSurvey_section1_socio']:checked").val() == "Employed part time (less than 30 hours per week) and enrolled in school or vocational training (in-school training for a skilled trade or occupation and/or on-the-job workplace training)"){
                            $('span#section1_school').show();
                        }
                        else{ $('span#section1_school').hide();}
                    }
                    _.defer(hideSchool);
                    $("input:radio[name='ElitePreprogramSurvey_section1_socio']").change(hideSchool);

                </script>

<script type='text/javascript'>
                    $('span#section1_career1').hide();
                    function hideCareer(){
                        if($("input:radio[name='ElitePreprogramSurvey_section1_socio']:checked").val() == "Employed full time (30 or more hours per week)"){
                            $('span#section1_career1').show();
                        }
                        else if($("input:radio[name='ElitePreprogramSurvey_section1_socio']:checked").val() == "Employed full time (30 or more hours per week) and enrolled in school or vocational training (in-school training for a skilled trade or occupation and/or on-the-job workplace training)"){
                            $('span#section1_career1').show();
                        }
                        else if($("input:radio[name='ElitePreprogramSurvey_section1_socio']:checked").val() == "Employed part time (less than 30 hours per week)"){
                            $('span#section1_career1').show();
                        }
                        else if($("input:radio[name='ElitePreprogramSurvey_section1_socio']:checked").val() == "Employed part time (less than 30 hours per week) and enrolled in school or vocational training (in-school training for a skilled trade or occupation and/or on-the-job workplace training)"){
                            $('span#section1_career1').show();
                        }
                        else{ $('span#section1_career1').hide();}
                    }
                    _.defer(hideCareer);
                    $("input:radio[name='ElitePreprogramSurvey_section1_socio']").change(hideCareer);

                </script>

ReportItem.options: High school|Collège d'enseignement général et professionnel (CEGEP)|Technical and/or vocational education (in-school training for a skilled trade or occupation) working towards a certification, diploma or degree|University, working towards an undergraduate degree|University, working towards a post-graduate degree|Prefer not to answer|Other

ReportSection.ReportItem:
3. Which of the following best describes the type of school or vocational training (in-school training for a skilled trade or occupation and/or on-the-job workplace training) you are currently enrolled in?

{$item}
Please Describe: {$item}
ReportSection.Static: 4. Listed below are statements related to how you feel about your career/job path. Please indicate to what extent you agree or disagree with the following statements.

ReportItem.options: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree nor disagree|Agree|Strongly Agree|Prefer not to answer

ReportSection.ReportItem:
I have the skills and/or knowledge to be successful in the workforce.

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree nor disagree|Agree|Strongly Agree|Prefer not to answer

ReportSection.ReportItem:
I have a clear vision of what my ideal job looks like.

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree nor disagree|Agree|Strongly Agree|Prefer not to answer

ReportSection.ReportItem:
I know what skills I need to develop in order to reach my career goals.

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree nor disagree|Agree|Strongly Agree|Prefer not to answer

ReportSection.ReportItem:
I am optimistic about attaining the career/job path that I want in the future.

{$item}
ReportSection.Static: 5. Listed below are statements related to your current job. Please indicate to what extent you agree or disagree with each statement. [If you are NOT employed full-time or part-time, please proceed to Question 6].

ReportItem.options: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree nor disagree|Agree|Strongly Agree|Prefer not to answer

ReportSection.ReportItem:
In my current job, I have the opportunity to use the skills and/or knowledge learned through school and/or training.

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree nor disagree|Agree|Strongly Agree|Prefer not to answer

ReportSection.ReportItem:
My current job is related to what I studied in school and/or training.

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree nor disagree|Agree|Strongly Agree|Prefer not to answer

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Within the next six months, I plan to change jobs.

{$item}

{$item}

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Access online programs or tools that inform your career plans or job path (e.g. job search strategies, interview prep, career transition)

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Yes, co-op (periods of study alternating with work placements)|Yes, internship (paid or unpaid work experiences)|Yes, apprenticeship (a combination of in-school training for a skilled trade or occupation, and on-the-job workplace training)|Yes, entrepreneurships (business incubator program or course, and/or launching own business with an accelerator and/or incubator)|Yes, other|No|Prefer not to answer

ReportSection.ReportItem:
7. Have you ever participated in a practical work experience (education-related opportunities to gain work-relevant skills in real workplaces) (select all that apply)?

{$item}
Specify: {$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                $('span#section1_workexp_other').hide();
                function workexpOther(){
                    var flag = false;
                    $('input[name="ElitePreprogramSurvey_section1_workexp[]"]:checked').each(function() {
                        if(this.value == "Yes, other"){
                            flag = true;
                        }
                    });
                    if(flag){$('span#section1_workexp_other').show();}
                    else{$('span#section1_workexp_other').hide();}
                }
                _.defer(workexpOther);
                $("input:checkbox[name='ElitePreprogramSurvey_section1_workexp[]']").change(workexpOther);
            </script>

ReportItem.options: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree nor disagree|Agree|Strongly Agree|Prefer not to answer

ReportSection.ReportItem:
8. Please indicate to what extent you agree or disagree with the following statement:
Participating in a practical work experience(s) helped better prepare me for the workforce.

{$item}
ReportSection.Static: The following questions ask about your confidence and experience with a number of different skills. Please answer these questions related to your life in general (e.g. includes personal life, work life, school life, extra-curricular activities etc.)
ReportSection.ReportItem:
9. Thinking about your life in general, please indicate how confident you are with the following activities.

Thinking through and identifying causes of problems.

{$item}

Figuring out how different ideas fit together.

{$item}

Considering viewpoints that are different from your own.

{$item}

Considering the pros and cons of different options and deciding which one is the best.

{$item}

10. Thinking about your experience in groups (e.g. at school or work, sports teams, volunteering etc.), please indicate how confident you are with the following activities.

Working cooperatively in groups to complete tasks, projects, or activities.

{$item}

Considering other people's perspectives in a group.

{$item}

Contributing your ideas and suggestions to a group.

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Frequently|Sometimes|Rarely|Never|Prefer not to answer

ReportSection.ReportItem:

ReportSection.ReportItem: {$item}

RBC, in partnership with the University of Waterloo's Youth & Innovation Project, is studying how the programs we support impact young people such as yourself, as well as Canada's economy and society, over the long term. If you would like to volunteer to participate in this important research please enter your first name, last name, email address, and the first three letters of your postal code below.

First Name:
{$item}

Last Name:
{$item}

Email:
{$item}

First three letters of your postal code:
{$item}

ReportItem.options: Relevant programs or opportunities offered by RBC, the RBC Foundation or its partners in which you may be interested.|Opportunities to participate in research studies related to the programs we support.|Opportunities to participate in RBC or RBC Foundation marketing and communications activities.

ReportSection.ReportItem:
By providing your email address you understand that your responses will no longer be anonymous. You agree that RBC and the RBC Foundation can contact you about the following: (select all that apply)

{$item}
ReportSection.Static: Thank you for taking the time to complete this survey. Your feedback and responses are appreciated.
